name: DefCon - Safe our Colonies
description:
Defend your colony. Set up defence towers and blockades to prevent the invaders from destroying your colonies.

Budget your resources and use your towers wisely.

On the title screen, you can press the left mouse button to start the challenge or the right mouse button to display the leaderboard.

Update 1:

  • Fix a bug in the highscorelist.
  • New buttons with more readable labels.

The game screen:
The towers can be placed with the left mouse button. However, only within the range of the planet or a platform. With the [Q] key, the area in which it is possible to place towers is coloured yellow. The [E] key colours the defensive range of the towers red.

If you keep the middle mouse button pressed, you can move the visible area. This can also be done with the [W], [A], [S] and [D] keys. The scroll wheel of the mouse is used to zoom in and out.

  1. Current colony being defended.
  2. Current wave of invaders.
  3. Your score.
  4. Time how long the threat from the mothership will last.
  5. Your Resource Cash to place more towers, platforms or blockades.
  6. Shows the area in which towers and blockades can be placed in yellow. [Q]
  7. Shows the range of the towers in red. [E]
  8. Selection of the plasma towers. [1]
  9. Selection of laser towers. [2]
  10. Selection of missile towers. [3]
  11. Selection of the blockades. [4]
  12. Selecting platforms to fill another area with towers.  [5]
                                                                                                                                                                         

The upgrade screen:
At the end of each wave you have the chance to upgrade and repair your towers.

  1.  Shows the values that can be improved.
  2. Select the towers you want to improve.
  3. Complete the research and upgrade of all existing towers. The upgrade costs are shown above.
  4. Here, only the research of the upgrade is completed.
  5. Switches to the repair screen.
  6. Ready for the next wave.
                                                                                                                                                                           


The repair screen:

All placed towers are displayed here with the damage bars. Clicking on a tower gives you the choice between repairing, upgrading and wrecking the structure. The costs for each of these are shown below.

                                                                                                                                                                                  

I hope you enjoy it.
